meanings.definition: A book or pad with blank pages for sketching or drawing.
meanings.sent1: I always carry my sketchbooks to draw my favorite animals.
meanings.sent2: Artists often use sketchbooks to practice their drawing skills.
meanings.sent3: My sketchbooks are like my best friends, always there to capture my ideas.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a collection of colorful images, like a library of sketchbooks.
meanings.sent5: The sketchbooks on the shelf whispered stories of creativity and imagination.

meanings.definition: A pad of drawing paper for use by artists.
meanings.sent1: The artist grabbed a few sketchbooks before heading to the park to sketch.
meanings.sent2: Sketchbooks are essential tools for artists to express their ideas.
meanings.sent3: The sketchbooks in the art store seemed to be calling out to be filled with art.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts flowed onto the pages of the sketchbooks like a river of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The sketchbooks lay open, inviting the artist to explore the world through art.
